io.netty.channel.socket.oio

类 DefaultOioSocketChannelConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelConfig
      • io.netty.channel.socket.DefaultSocketChannelConfig
        • io.netty.channel.socket.oio.DefaultOioSocketChannelConfig
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ChannelConfig, OioSocketChannelConfig, SocketChannelConfig

    public class DefaultOioSocketChannelConfig
extends DefaultSocketChannelConfig
implements OioSocketChannelConfig
    Default OioSocketChannelConfig implementation

      Is called once DefaultChannelConfig.setAutoRead(boolean) is called with false and DefaultChannelConfig.isAutoRead() was true before.

      Returns the maximal time a operation on the underlying socket may block.

      Set the ByteBufAllocator which is used for the channel to allocate buffers.

      Sets whether the channel should not close itself when its remote peer shuts down output to make the connection half-closed.

      Sets if ChannelHandlerContext.read() will be invoked automatically so that a user application doesn't need to call it at all.

      Sets the connect timeout of the channel in milliseconds.

      • setOption

        public <T> boolean setOption(ChannelOption<T> option,
                             T value)
        从接口复制的说明: ChannelConfig
        Sets a configuration property with the specified name and value. To override this method properly, you must call the super class: 
         public boolean setOption(ChannelOption<T> option, T value) {
     if (super.setOption(option, value)) {
         return true;
     }

     if (option.equals(additionalOption)) {
         ....
         return true;
     }

     return false;
 }

      • setTcpNoDelay

        public OioSocketChannelConfig setTcpNoDelay(boolean tcpNoDelay)
        从接口复制的说明: SocketChannelConfig
        Sets the StandardSocketOptions.TCP_NODELAY option. Please note that the default value of this option is true unlike the operating system default (false). However, for some buggy platforms, such as Android, that shows erratic behavior with Nagle's algorithm disabled, the default value remains to be false.
        指定者:
        setTcpNoDelay 在接口中 OioSocketChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setTcpNoDelay 在接口中 SocketChannelConfig
        覆盖:
        setTcpNoDelay 在类中 DefaultSocketChannelConfig

      • setAllowHalfClosure

        public OioSocketChannelConfig setAllowHalfClosure(boolean allowHalfClosure)
        从接口复制的说明: SocketChannelConfig
        Sets whether the channel should not close itself when its remote peer shuts down output to make the connection half-closed. If true the connection is not closed when the remote peer shuts down output. Instead, ChannelInboundHandler.userEventTriggered(ChannelHandlerContext, Object) is invoked with a ChannelInputShutdownEvent object. If false, the connection is closed automatically.
        指定者:
        setAllowHalfClosure 在接口中 OioSocketChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setAllowHalfClosure 在接口中 SocketChannelConfig
        覆盖:
        setAllowHalfClosure 在类中 DefaultSocketChannelConfig

      • setConnectTimeoutMillis

        public OioSocketChannelConfig setConnectTimeoutMillis(int connectTimeoutMillis)
        从接口复制的说明: ChannelConfig
        Sets the connect timeout of the channel in milliseconds. If the Channel does not support connect operation, this property is not used at all, and therefore will be ignored.
        指定者:
        setConnectTimeoutMillis 在接口中 ChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setConnectTimeoutMillis 在接口中 OioSocketChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setConnectTimeoutMillis 在接口中 SocketChannelConfig
        覆盖:
        setConnectTimeoutMillis 在类中 DefaultSocketChannelConfig
        参数:
        connectTimeoutMillis - the connect timeout in milliseconds. 0 to disable.

      • setWriteSpinCount

        public OioSocketChannelConfig setWriteSpinCount(int writeSpinCount)
        从接口复制的说明: ChannelConfig
        Sets the maximum loop count for a write operation until WritableByteChannel.write(ByteBuffer) returns a non-zero value. It is similar to what a spin lock is used for in concurrency programming. It improves memory utilization and write throughput depending on the platform that JVM runs on. The default value is 16.
        指定者:
        setWriteSpinCount 在接口中 ChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setWriteSpinCount 在接口中 OioSocketChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setWriteSpinCount 在接口中 SocketChannelConfig
        覆盖:
        setWriteSpinCount 在类中 DefaultSocketChannelConfig

      • setAutoRead

        public OioSocketChannelConfig setAutoRead(boolean autoRead)
        从接口复制的说明: ChannelConfig
        Sets if ChannelHandlerContext.read() will be invoked automatically so that a user application doesn't need to call it at all. The default value is true.
        指定者:
        setAutoRead 在接口中 ChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setAutoRead 在接口中 OioSocketChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setAutoRead 在接口中 SocketChannelConfig

      • setWriteBufferHighWaterMark

        public OioSocketChannelConfig setWriteBufferHighWaterMark(int writeBufferHighWaterMark)
        从接口复制的说明: ChannelConfig

        Sets the high water mark of the write buffer. If the number of bytes queued in the write buffer exceeds this value, Channel.isWritable() will start to return false.

        指定者:
        setWriteBufferHighWaterMark 在接口中 ChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setWriteBufferHighWaterMark 在接口中 OioSocketChannelConfig
        覆盖:
        setWriteBufferHighWaterMark 在类中 DefaultSocketChannelConfig

      • setWriteBufferLowWaterMark

        public OioSocketChannelConfig setWriteBufferLowWaterMark(int writeBufferLowWaterMark)
        从接口复制的说明: ChannelConfig

        Sets the low water mark of the write buffer. Once the number of bytes queued in the write buffer exceeded the high water mark and then dropped down below this value, Channel.isWritable() will start to return true again.

        指定者:
        setWriteBufferLowWaterMark 在接口中 ChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setWriteBufferLowWaterMark 在接口中 OioSocketChannelConfig
        覆盖:
        setWriteBufferLowWaterMark 在类中 DefaultSocketChannelConfig

      • setWriteBufferWaterMark

        public OioSocketChannelConfig setWriteBufferWaterMark(WriteBufferWaterMark writeBufferWaterMark)
        从接口复制的说明: ChannelConfig
        Set the WriteBufferWaterMark which is used for setting the high and low water mark of the write buffer.
        指定者:
        setWriteBufferWaterMark 在接口中 ChannelConfig
        指定者:
        setWriteBufferWaterMark 在接口中 OioSocketChannelConfig
